original_title: Olrick Johnson Jr.: Bless My Soul
overview: From the sports stadium to the concert arena, former NFL linebacker Olrick Johnson Jr. shifts his focus from winning games to winning over music fans. With a repertoire that includes singing backup for artists such as John Secada and Gloria Estefan and numerous music video appearances, Johnson has now embarked on a solo career. Featured on this DVD, his debut album, "Bless My Soul," is a rich gospel treat infused with soulful R&B rhythms.
title: Olrick Johnson Jr.: Bless My Soul
